definition: to press hard/to close in on
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
to force (sb to do sth)/to compel/to press for/to extort/to press on towards/to press up to/to close in on/euphemistic variant of 屄[bi1]
variant of 逼[bi1]/to compel/to pressure

sentences.english: The Americans kept hustling, and it finally paid off in the 104th minute.
sentences.chinese: 美国人继续紧逼，最终在第104分钟得到回报。

sentences.english: Tight marking or even man marking in midfield can have massive effects on the defensive performance.
sentences.chinese: 中场的紧逼盯人甚至人盯人对防守相当有利。

sentences.english: The full-court press is legs, not arms.
sentences.chinese: 全场紧逼靠的是脚，而非手。

sentences.english: I knew your team broke through the Shanghai team's half-court pre .
sentences.chinese: 我知道你们球队打破了上海队的半场紧逼。

sentences.english: Do you know how to play full-court press?
sentences.chinese: 你会打全场区域紧逼吗？

sentences.english: He never used the full-court press the same way again.
sentences.chinese: 在余下的赛季，他再也没那样使用全场紧逼。

sentences.english: Armed police have barricaded people again, stepping forward forcing them back.
sentences.chinese: 武警再筑人墙，双方步步紧逼。

sentences.english: When he first time has dribbled half-court encounters presses hard on, and presents the fault.
sentences.chinese: 在他第一次带球过半场时就遭到紧逼，并出现失误。

sentences.english: Yet the puzzle of the press is that it has never become popular.
sentences.chinese: 令人不解的是，全场紧逼战术从来没有真正流行起来。

sentences.english: Added Tight Marking to view menu in the in-match tactics .
sentences.chinese: 添加为比赛中的战术菜单添加紧逼防守选项。

sentences.english: The NBA, meanwhile, is making a full-court press.
sentences.chinese: 同时，NBA在制造全场紧逼时。

sentences.english: Our team broke through the Shanghai team's half-court press.
sentences.chinese: 我们球队打破了上海队的半场紧逼。

sentences.english: You can also toggle between Loose/Tight marking.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在宽松盯防和紧逼盯防中切换。

sentences.english: I know your team broke through the Shanghai team's half-court press.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你们球队打破了上海队的半场紧逼。

sentences.english: I knew your team broke through the Shanghai team's half-court press.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你们球队打破了上海队的半场紧逼。

definition: to advance on sth/to press closely (on some goal)
pincer attack/attack from two or more sides/converging attack/attack on a flank/fork in chess, with one piece making two attacks
to pull back (an army)/to retreat
variant of 凶狠[xiong1 hen3]
cruel/vicious/fierce and malicious/vengeful
to attack violently/to storm
to strike back/to beat back/to counterattack
(military) offensive
dominant/controlling/strong/opposite: weak, yielding 弱受/to take by storm (military)
defensive position/guard
to attack for a long time without success
to sally/to attack
to force/to compel/to coerce
to retreat again and again in defeat/to suffer defeat after defeat
overbearing/forceful/aggressive/menacing/imperious
no strategy left to try (idiom); at one's wit's end/at the end of one's tether/powerless
attack from two sides/pincer movement/converging attack/attack on a flank/fork in chess, with one piece making two attacks
